title: Nightflyers Episode 1 "All That We Left Behind" Breakdown!
author: Think Story
comment: Please continue to cover each episode. You’re content is really good, and very concise and very entertaining. Looking forward to more.
This was such  a great breakdown!! Because I was so confused...please please continue to review each episode. You are AMAZING!
What do you guys think of the show? Should I keep doing breakdowns for it?

So glad to still see the "Daddy loves you very much" at the end. Keep it going show by show, week by week. I like the show so far and I love being able to see another person's thoughts on the show since I live and watch this show alone. This way I can get another view of it that I might not have thought about so , thanks and keep them coming!

Oh I was waiting for this show. Had no idea that it started broadcasting already! I am gonna watch the first episode then I will come back to watch this! I am glad we are watching the same show again after Castle Rock Daniel! Keep up the good work👏👏
description:
I break down the first episode of George R.R. Martin's Netflix adaptation of "Nightflyers" episode 1, "All That We Left Behind" as well as look at different theories and details you missed!
